mapper.insert: insert into festival( festival_id, festival_place , festival_start_date , festival_end_date , festival_content, festival_phonenum, festival_site, festival_road_name_addr, festival_lotnum_addr, festival_lat, festival_long) values ( #{festival_id}, #{festival_place}, #{festival_start_date}, #{festival_end_date}, #{festival_content}, #{festival_phonenum}, #{festival_site}, #{festival_road_name_addr}, #{festival_lotnum_addr}, #{festival_lat}, #{festival_long})
